remarks: Value of a function on pairs, given two projections ` F ` and ` G ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fvproj.h $e |- H = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> <. ( F ` x ) , ( G ` y ) >. ) $.
fvproj.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
fvproj.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fvproj $p |- ( ph -> ( H ` <. X , Y >. ) = <. ( F ` X ) , ( G ` Y ) >. ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
